page.title: 11A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: We always do{maths}first while we are doing the register but later in the morning we do writing for our{Domesday folders.At 10.30 we have break, it lasts for 15 minutes.The bell goes at 10.45 and we all have to line up until our teacher comes.On Wednesdays we do {P.E} on the apparatus then we do maths tasks or more writing until 12.00.In the afternoon we normally do science or activities.On Thursdays we do games,we play rounders and the boys play football.At 2.30 we have another break until 2.45 then we go back into the classroom and read or have a story until 3.30.
